text:
Ah... I see... Yakisoba is delicious...
And... it says shaved ice is recommended too...

Oh, Amana.
Are you looking up about the upcoming festival?

Yeah~!
I was thinking about where to go.
There are a lot of stalls, huh?

Yeah! If we just go there without a plan,
we'll definitely get lost.

It would be annoying to say "I wanted to
eat here too!" after getting full.

By the way,
what's the recommended stall so far?

It seems that a popular local Japanese confectionery shop
will have a stall! They are particular about their ingredients~!

Hehe, looking forward to the
festival with everyone~â˜†
